TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseDataListDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner implements class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider, class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceProvider
Public MustInherit Class BaseDataListDesigner Inherits TemplatedControlDesigner Implements IDataBindingSchemaProvider, IDataSourceProvider

summary.span: 提供元件的基底類別，這些元件可在設計工具主應用程式中，為衍生自 類別的 Web 伺服器控制項提供設計階段支援。

span.span: Provides a base class for components that provide design-time support in a designer host for Web server controls that are derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在設計工具主機中，當使用者從來源切換到設計檢視中，描述控制項的標記原始碼衍生自抽象類別會剖析，並在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。In a designer host, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 當使用者切換回原始碼檢視中時，設計階段控制項就會保存標記原始程式碼，並編輯成 Web 網頁的標記。When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 抽象類別做為衍生自的控制項提供設計階段支援的元件的基底類別設計工具主應用程式中。The abstract class serves as a base class for components that provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the in a designer host. 類別屬性會提供下列功能：The class properties provide the following functionality: 屬性會傳回物件，其通常包含物件，衍生自類別設計工具，在繼承樹狀結構中的每個層級。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. - ， ， ，和屬性可存取之相關聯控制項的對應屬性。The , , , and properties provide access to the corresponding properties of the associated control. - 屬性提供設計工具相關聯控制項的資料來源的存取。The property provides access to the designer of the data source of the associated control. 屬性會取得資料來源的預設檢視。The property gets the default view of the data source. 類別方法會提供下列功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法準備以檢視、 編輯和設計關聯的控制項設計工具。The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control. 方法會叫用控制項的元件編輯器。The method invokes a component editor for the control. 方法用來新增、 移除，或是遮蔽關聯控制項的設計階段屬性。The method is used to add, remove, or shadow design-time properties of the associated control. - 方法會產生可以在設計階段用做為資料來源的物件。The method generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time. 方法取得的資料來源從關聯控制項的容器。The method gets the data source from the container of the associated control. 方法取得從控制項容器中，解析成特定資料成員的資料來源。The method gets the data source from the control container, resolved to a specific data member. 方法取得的資料來源的 [範本] 容器。The method gets the data source of the template container. - 至相關聯的控制項變更時，呼叫方法。The method is called when there is a change to the associated control. 關聯的控制項的資料來源有變更時呼叫方法。The method is called when the associated control data source has changed. 關聯的控制項的資料來源的結構描述變更時，所呼叫方法。The method is called when the schema of the associated control data source changes. 時已套用自動格式化配置呼叫方法。The method is called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied. - 和可以覆寫方法實作相關聯的控制項樣式變更時，或當設計工具的樣板編輯動詞命令已變更，分別應產生的功能。The and methods can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when an associated control style has changed or when the designer template-editing verbs have changed, respectively. 方法處理屬性產生器事件。The method handles the property-builder event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體類別時，它會建立關聯的控制項衍生自類別或該控制項的設計介面上的複本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the class or a copy of that control on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性建立空物件並將加入所傳回基底屬性至此物件。The property creates an empty object and adds the that is returned by the base property to this object. 然後它會將它加入物件，然後再傳回此物件。Then it adds it to the object, and then returns this object.

span.span: Gets or sets the designer's version of the data source ID property and is used to shadow the corresponding property of the associated control.

span.span: A that is the data source ID of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定設計工具的屬性原因設定相關聯的控制項屬性。Setting the designer's property causes the property of the associated control to be set. 如果設，指出新的資料來源定義，**建立資料來源**對話方塊隨即出現。If the is set to a , indicating a new data source is to be defined, a **Create Data Source** dialog box is displayed. 如果設指出沒有資料來源，設為空字串 ("")。If the is set to a indicating there is no data source, the is set to an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得資料來源是藉由傳遞繫結至相關聯控制項的預設檢視屬性方法物件。The property gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control by passing the property to the method of the object. 如果不傳回的任何檢視或未設定屬性，方法用來取得檢視名稱 」 和 「 第一個檢視表名稱用來取得預設檢視。If no view is returned or the property is not set, the method of the is used to get the view names and the first view name is used to get the default view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計工具主應用程式呼叫方法時，就可以使用設計工具來呈現控制項衍生自類別。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control that is derived from the class. 以及其基底方法設定屬性，並連接至所需的設計工具的作業事件。The method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. 連接設計階段資料來源並更新的設計階段標記。The connects to the design-time data source and updates the design-time markup. 如果屬性實作介面，連接， ，和事件。If the property implements the interface, the connects the , , and events. `component`參數是衍生自控制項，也就是與這個設計工具或該控制項的複本相關聯。The `component` parameter is the control, derived from the , that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.

A物件會定義套用至控制項的物件。A object defines a object that is applied to the control. 設計工具可以覆寫檢查控制項的屬性，或採取其他動作。A designer can override the to inspect properties of the control or to take some other action.

summary.span: 在關聯的控制項有變更時呼叫。

span.span: Called when there is a change to the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法時，會呼叫衍生自控制項的事件類別執行。The method is called when the event of a control that is derived from the class executes. 一般而言，這是在回應上控制項的屬性變更 (例如，**屬性**方格變更)。Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change). 如果變更此控制項繫結的物件，在設計介面上重繪控制項時。If the object to which the control is bound is changed, the control is redrawn on the design surface.

summary.span: 當關聯控制項的資料來源已經變更時呼叫。

span.span: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相關聯的控制項衍生自的基底方法連接類別目前的資料來源，方法是從資料來源控制項已連線到不同，如果更新的設計階段標記。The base method connects the associated control that is derived from the class to the current data source, and if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, the method updates the design-time markup.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSchemaRefreshed() cil managed

summary.span: 當關聯控制項的資料來源結構描述變更時呼叫。

span.span: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非在設計工具處於樣板編輯模式或欄位為已加入或編輯，方法呼叫方法中，依序呼叫方法，以更新以反映資料來源變更的控制項。Unless the designer is in template-editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the method calls the method, which in turn calls the method to update the control to reflect the data source change.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig instance void OnStylesChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 可加以覆寫，以實作關聯控制項的樣式變更時應該產生的功能。

span.span: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when a style of the associated control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以做為通知控制相關聯的樣式，衍生自類別已變更。The method can serve as notification that a style of the associated control that is derived from the class has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 可加以覆寫，以實作設計工具樣板編輯動作變更時應該產生的功能。

span.span: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when the designer template-editing verbs have changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以實作以執行額外處理，這類記錄已經發生變更，當範本編輯動詞命令變更。The method can be implemented to perform additional processing, such recording that a change has occurred, when the template-editing verbs change.

para.span: 方法為抽象，並且必須被覆寫，當在衍生的類別繼承自類別。

span.span: The method is abstract and must be overridden when a derived class inherits from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 實作加入屬性和遮蔽屬性的 介面之集合。

span.span: A collection implementing an interface of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 供設計工具使用，以便在 [屬性] 方格的顯示中移除屬性或新增屬性，或是遮蔽關聯控制項的屬性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項設計工具使用的方法，以衍生自方法来遮蔽各種控制項屬性與對應的設計階段屬性在設計工具實作，並將屬性加入到或從其中移除屬性**屬性**方格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 衍生自控制項類別建立設計階段屬性，以陰影， ， ，和屬性。For controls that are derived from the class, the creates design-time properties to shadow the , , , and properties.

para.span: 覆寫方法，以將屬性加入到或變更設計階段屬性集合中屬性的屬性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 請務必呼叫基底方法，然後再執行其他處理。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.
